title: Reducing space threats through norms, rules and principles of responsible behaviours
text:
United Nations 
A/C.1/80/L.35 
 
 
General Assembly 
Distr.: Limited 
14 October 2025 
Original: English 
 
25-16636 (E)    171025 
*2516636* 
 
 
Eightieth session 
First Committee 
Agenda item 97 (d) 
Prevention of an arms race in outer space: reducing space threats 
through norms, rules and principles of responsible behaviours 
 
 
 
 
 
United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland: draft decision 
 
 
 
 Reducing space threats through norms, rules and principles of 
responsible behaviours 
 
 
 
The General Assembly, recalling its resolutions 79/22 of 2 December 2024, 
decides to include in the provisional agenda of its eighty-first session, under the item 
entitled “Prevention of an arms race in outer space”, the sub-item entitled “Reducing 
space threats through norms, rules and principles of responsible behaviours”.
